name: Jump: The Game
description:
Enjoy "Jump: The Game," a game I pretty much copied from a Youtube tutorial series by GucioDev(he's not that bad, by the way). To be fair I DID include my own assets initially but they pretty much messed up the game. So yeah, it took me 3 days to make this.

Features:

  1. Double Jumping
  2. No dying, even if you fall
  3. Because of this game's simplistic design, you won't rage
